page.title: 12Farms in Hutton Buscel
page.content:
{West End Farm in Hutton Buscel} This farm is owned by Mr Robinson. He rents the farm from {Lord Downe}. He grows corn,oil seed rape and sugar beet. He doesnt keep animals but he lets people keep their animais on his grass land. He owns some land near { {Charm park}.
{Manor Farm.} It is owned by Mr WH Jackson. He owns
about {580}acres of land.There are four {tractors}a fork lift and a selection of implements. He rents the farm from{Lord Downe}. He also rents { {Ancat}farm which is about one mile up Great Moor Road.A new shed has just been built at {Ancat. }He grows ,potatoes,corn, root crops but not sugar beet and Linseed. He employs three people.
